Headline: #171 Univ. of Chgo/Hyde Park Temporary Northbound Reroute near 53rd/Hyde Park
ShortDescription: Northbound 171 Univ. of Chgo/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and 55th due to street blockage near 53rd/Hyde Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #171 Univ. of Chgo/Hyde Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and 55th, due to street blockage near 53rd/Hyde Park.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 54th/Cermak and Central Park
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between 54th/Cermak and Central Park due to track switching problems.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop, downtown, and Central Park at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between 54th/Cermak and Central Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
